item.title: PePS2
item.description: PePS2 is a phase II trial of pembrolizumab in performance status 2 non-small-cell lung cancer patients. It is run by the Cancer Research UK Clinical Trials Unit.

item.title: Ibrutinib Plus Venetoclax in Relapsed/Refractory Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia - The CLARITY Study
item.description: This publication is important to me because Clarity was my first successful grant application. It is a simple trial with modest sample size but the results are absolutely amazing, with an iwCLL response rate of 89% and minimum disease negative status achieved in the peripheral blood of 53% of patients.
